thread.title: Melissa Etheridge sings for inmates at Ohio women's prison
thread.title_full: Melissa Etheridge sings for inmates at Ohio women's prison

title: Melissa Etheridge sings for inmates at Ohio women's prison
text:
> Ohio Melissa Etheridge sings for inmates at Ohio women's prison Melissa Etheridge performs for inmates at the Ohio Reformatory for Women in Marysville, Ohio, on Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. Etheridge says a video of female inmates singing one of her songs led to her performing with them. (Jonathan Quilter/Columbus Dispatch via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
